name: Attrac & Ion
description:
Game developed in 48 hours in Malagajam Weekend VI (Málaga, Spain).

Prizes
  • Best Game
  • Best Art

Nominations

  • Best Sound

It's a cooperative game. You are constantly attracted to your partner, you have to press "A" (controller) or "Ctrl" (keyboard) to propel you to the opposite direction.


Design: Jose Antonio Moreno

Develop: Emilio Cano
